text: Mother () is a novel written by Maxim Gorky in 1906.Alexander Kremer, Self and Society (Amsterdam: Rodopi, 2009), p. 103 It is about an uneducated woman who began to take on extreme political beliefs. It was translated into many languages, many movies are also inspired by it. *Mother (1926), directed by Vsevolod Pudovkin *Mother (1956), directed by Mark Donskoy *Mother (1990), directed by Gleb Panfilov The play The Mother by German playwright Bertolt Brecht is based on this novel. ==References== Category:Russian novels Category:1906 books
